mapper.select: SELECT o.*, m.m_name, m.m_id, m.m_ph, order_nb_title(o.o_order_num) nb_title, order_nb_price(o_order_num) o_order_price , (SELECT SUM(o_de_count) FROM order_detail od WHERE o.o_order_num = od.o_order_num) o_order_count FROM orderr o, member m WHERE o.m_num = m.m_num(+) AND o_order_num = #{o_order_num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_cancel VALUES (#{o_order_num}, CONCAT('C',#{o_order_num}), sysdate)
INSERT INTO order_exch VALUES (#{o_order_num}, CONCAT('EX',#{o_order_num}), sysdate, #{o_ex_deli}, #{o_ex_track})
INSERT INTO order_return VALUES (#{o_order_num}, CONCAT('RE',#{o_order_num}), sysdate, #{o_re_deli}, #{o_re_track})

INSERT INTO orderr VALUES(CONCAT(TO_CHAR(sysdate,'yyyymmdd'), '0001'), #{m_num}, sysdate, 0, 2, #{o_pay_price}, 1, 1234567890, #{o_deliv_price}, #{o_point}, #{o_rec_name}, #{o_rec_mail}, #{o_rec_ph}, '선물 수락 대기 중', '선물 수락 대기 중', null, null)
INSERT INTO point_list VALUES(POINTLIST_P_NUM_SEQ.nextval, TO_CHAR(sysdate,'yyyymmdd') || '0001', #{m_num}, null, null, sysdate, 1, (#{o_pay_price} * 0.01))
mapper.select: SELECT o.o_order_num, o.o_rec_name, o.o_rec_mail, o.o_rec_ph , m.m_name, m.m_ph , nb.nb_image, nb.nb_title, od.o_de_count FROM orderr o, member m, newbook nb, order_detail od WHERE o.o_order_num = #{o_order_num} AND o.m_num = m.m_num AND od.nb_num = nb.nb_num AND o.o_order_num = od.o_order_num
